subject: Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race (Alaska)
Dogs
Cruelty to Animals
lead_paragraph: Animal-rights groups continue to voice concerns about the appropriateness of the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race, which led to the deaths of three dogs this year.
snippet: Animal-rights groups continue to voice concerns about the appropriateness of the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race, which led to the deaths of three dogs this year.
